mapper.select: SELECT pl.*, p.project_name, u.nickname as user_nickname FROM prompt_log pl LEFT JOIN project p ON pl.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN user u ON pl.user_id = u.id WHERE pl.id = #{id}

SELECT pl.*, p.project_name, u.nickname as user_nickname FROM prompt_log pl LEFT JOIN project p ON pl.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN user u ON pl.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN project_member pm ON pl.project_id = pm.project_id AND pm.user_id = #{userId} WHERE pl.project_id = #{projectId} AND (pm.user_id IS NOT NULL OR p.owner_id = #{userId}) ORDER BY pl.create_time DESC

SELECT pl.*, p.project_name, u.nickname as user_nickname FROM prompt_log pl LEFT JOIN project p ON pl.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN user u ON pl.user_id = u.id WHERE pl.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY pl.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE prompt_log SET ai_response = #{aiResponse}, final_prompt = #{finalPrompt}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM prompt_log WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT pl.*, p.project_name, u.nickname as user_nickname, u.username FROM prompt_log pl LEFT JOIN project p ON pl.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN user u ON pl.user_id = u.id ORDER BY pl.create_time DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{count}

SELECT pl.*, p.project_name, u.nickname as user_nickname, u.username FROM prompt_log pl LEFT JOIN project p ON pl.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN user u ON pl.user_id = u.id WHERE u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%') ORDER BY pl.create_time DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{count}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM prompt_log pl LEFT JOIN user u ON pl.user_id = u.id WHERE u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')

SELECT u.id as userId, u.username, u.nickname, COUNT(pl.id) as usageCount, DATE_FORMAT(MAX(pl.create_time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastUsageTime, (SELECT p.project_name FROM prompt_log pl2 LEFT JOIN project p ON pl2.project_id = p.id WHERE pl2.user_id = u.id GROUP BY pl2.project_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1) as mostUsedProject FROM user u LEFT JOIN prompt_log pl ON u.id = pl.user_id GROUP BY u.id, u.username, u.nickname HAVING usageCount > 0 ORDER BY usageCount DESC, lastUsageTime DESC
